DOC.brief_summary: Prospective cohort study of factors predisposing to persistent post surgical pain after video-assisted thoracic surgery
DOC.brief_title: Prediction of Persistent Postsurgical Pain After Video-assisted Thoracic Surgery (VATS)
DOC.criteria: Age < 18 years old Elective lung cancer surgery (VATS) do not understand Danish cognitive reduction bilateral procedure planned previous thoracic surgery pregnant or nursing known nerve affection from other cause alcohol/substance abuse inability to cooperate to pain scoring/sensory examination > 5 mg methylprednisolone/day
